autoConfiguration.error: If the problem occurs again, create a support ticket in CleverReach® help center.

abandonedCart.title: Abandoned Cart
abandonedCart.send: Send automated emails to customers, who abandoned their checkout.
abandonedCart.sendEmails: To send emails this option has to be enabled!
abandonedCart.timingDesc: If the customer abandons their checkout, send them an email reminder to complete their order after
abandonedCart.doiActive: The double opt-in function is active.
abandonedCart.doiInactive: The double opt-in function is inactive.
abandonedCart.doiErrorShop: Double opt-in can not be activated since it is not activated in the shop.
abandonedCart.doiErrorAccount: Double opt-in can not be activated since your CleverReach account is not verified yet. Please contact our support.
abandonedCart.turnOff: Turn off any other abandoned cart functions!
abandonedCart.turnOffDesc: You have to disable any other abandoned cart features in Shopware to send emails properly. Be aware of any activated third party features!
abandonedCart.recordsLink: You will find an overview in the menu at Orders > Abandoned Cart.

syncSettings.gdpr: Select the recipients for the import. Observe the guidelines of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
syncSettings.changes: All changes will be applied on future synchronizations. No data will be deleted on CleverReach.
syncSettings.orderImport: CleverReach imports your order data of the last 1 year. You can import older data if you want.
syncSettings.importInBackground: Data will be imported in the background. You can proceed with your action.

initialSync.accountSetup: Account setup is running in the background
initialSync.addingFields: 2. Adding data fields, segments and tags
initialSync.errorMessage: You can retry now. If the problem occurs again, please create a support ticket in CleverReach® help center.

dashboard.tipsTricks: Tips and tricks from our blog.
dashboard.disconnectTitle: You are about to disconnect your CleverReach® account!
dashboard.disconnectDescription: If your account is disconnected no synchronization between Shopware and CleverReach® is possible.

forms.title: Signup Forms
forms.overview: This is an overview of your signup forms. You can edit or add them to your store.
forms.formsHowTo: Learn how to add a form.

refresh.title: Your CleverReach® account is disconnected
refresh.description: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your account to use the app.
